Editorial Board of MODE

The Editorial Board of MODE consists of nine specialists in various disciplines: philology and critical editing, computer science, technologies and history of printing, music theory, and early modern music history.

Directing Committee

MODE Co-Directors:

  • Mauro Calcagno,  University of Pennsylvania
  • Giuseppe Gerbino, Columbia University
  • Laurent Pugin, Répertoire International des Sources Musicales [RISM], Switzerland

MODE Senior Editors:

  • Christine Jeanneret, University of Copenhagen
  • Lucia Marchi, Northeastern Illinois University and De Paul University

Consulting Committee
